about_the_game:
The 2nd add-on included in the season pass. This set includes the following:

Obtainable Aircraft:
ADF-01 FALKEN
A large fighter developed by North Osea Gründer Industries. Representing the culmination of Belka's military technology, it is highly maneuverable, capable of stealth, and loaded with high-output lasers and fuel air explosive (FAE) bombs.
This set also includes 7 skins, including the special "Wardog Skin", and the new special weapon "FAEB".

The ADF-01 FALKEN can choose between TLS, 4AAM, and FAEB for its special weapon.

1 Aircraft Skin:
•Su-30M2 Sol Skin

4 Emblems:
•Wardog (emblem)
The emblem of Osean Air Defense Forces 108th Tactical Fighter Squadron Sand Island Detachment, "Wardog."

•The Aces of Razgriz / The Ghosts of Razgriz
The emblem of Razgriz Squadron.

•Scarface (emblem)
The emblem of the USEA Allied Forces 37th Air Force 18th Tactical Fighter Wing 1st Special Tactical Fighter Squadron "Scarface."
detailed_description:
The 2nd add-on included in the season pass. This set includes the following:

Obtainable Aircraft:
ADF-01 FALKEN
A large fighter developed by North Osea Gründer Industries. Representing the culmination of Belka's military technology, it is highly maneuverable, capable of stealth, and loaded with high-output lasers and fuel air explosive (FAE) bombs.
This set also includes 7 skins, including the special "Wardog Skin", and the new special weapon "FAEB".

The ADF-01 FALKEN can choose between TLS, 4AAM, and FAEB for its special weapon.

1 Aircraft Skin:
•Su-30M2 Sol Skin

4 Emblems:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-7100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750Ti(2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (3GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound card
